task.title: Adding People to a Board
task.shortdesc: Adding people to a board will allow for collaboration. If people are allowed to collaborate effictivly, productivity of work will increase.

prereq.p: Before you can add someone to a board, you must login and create a board.

context.p: On the standard plan you can invite up to 3 people to a board at no cost. If you invite more than 3 people, you will have to pay for a multi user account.

step.cmd: From the board page, click on the “+” sign under the person tab.
A box will pop up with a text box, and a current list of people on the project.
Select the desired persons name, or send an email to them.

info.p: An email invite will be sent to the person and they can join the board.
